title: Will Work With A BROKEN LEASE or Eviction Over 1 Year!
posting_body: ['MENTION AD: 715', 'Close to The Parks Mall and the Arlington Highlands shopping, there is easy access to Dallas and Fort Worth via Highway 360, I-20 and I-30.', 'Community Amenities: Perimeter Fence, Outdoor Grills, Picnic Area, Dog Park, State Of The Art Fitness Center, Gated Entrance, Two Sparkling Pools, Business Center, Clothes Care Center', 'Unit Amenities: Cable ready, Walk-in closets, Storage Closet Outside, W/D, Ice makers, Wood Flooring, Black Appliances, Frost Free Refrigerators, Garbage Disposals, Miniblinds, Dishwashers, Private Patios/Balconies, Ceiling Fan', 'In All Rooms, Microwaves, Self cleaning Ovens, Pantry, and Much More', 'I OFFER A CASH REBATE TO YOU UP TO $200 FOR USING MY LOCATING SERVICES!!!!!', 'NEED A 2ND CHANCE (BROKEN LEASE, EVICTION, CLOSED BANKRUPTCY, FORECLOSURE)', 'I CAN HELP', 'FREE LOCATING SERVICE :', 'My Services Are Free To You!', 'Whenever You Lease An Apartment and Put List Me As Your Referral Source.', 'I Find The Best Deals For You in All Areas and Saves You Time!', 'For More Information on This Property and Other Great Properties In The Area', 'Desiree Galloway| Real Estate Agent | DASH Realty', 'show contact info', 'Prices and Specials Change Daily, Contact Me for Availability.']
